Articles.Content:
Download if you please, changes will be made, please give me feed back..

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_JCubPchGFKdUVoTnhwbjYtM2M
Moving this over to the Spacecraft Exchange. You'll likely get better response if you add some screenshots of your craft to spur some interest.

There's a phrase here on the forums... it goes:

"No pics, no clicks!"

https://plus.google.com/115474247218741785259/posts/bK5Ary2uatd

Here's a few images.

- - - Updated - - -

I currently have;

Near-shoemaker

Hayabusa

Proton rocket (Empty so you can put your own probes in.)

Deep Impact

Stardust

And Yutu ('Jade rabbit' a Chinese lunar rover.)

I will be adding more crafts. (And soon some manned ones too!)
